projectDesc.p: The edition was scanned in 2008 at Leiden University by Arlo Griffiths with the help of his assistant Shila Schoots. Based on these scans, the edition was rekeyed 2009 by typists based in South India whose work was coordinated by Thomas Malten. The work was done at the time with a low budget furnished by Arlo Griffiths and left a lot to be desired. It has remained dormant for nearly 15 years and has now (Febr. 2024) started to be gradually cleaned up.

div.head:
mudrākara:–
śrī madanamohana dāsa
mukura pres
kaṭaka-2

lg.l:
3| kuntī gāndhārī saha dhrutarāṣṭra o sañjaẏa
bidurara bānaprasthāśrame gamana o tīrthayātrā
barṇṇanā ... 34

4| yudhiṣṭhiraṅkara sasainye dhrutarāṣṭraṅka nikaṭaku
gamana o bidhabā nārīmānaṅka svargaprapti ... 39

5| biduraṅkara yudhiṣṭhiraṅka dehe prabeśa o
deha saṁskāra ... 47

6| sañjaẏara paḷāẏana, dhrutarāṣṭra gāndhārī o
kuntī banadāhe dahana o antyeṣṭitriẏā ... 53
śuṇa ho sugyaṁjane śāmba kumarara kathā
śrī mahābhāratha ẏe madhura rasa cītā | 1 |
śrī bhāratha kathā ẏe amruta rasa bāṇī
sahasra bāṛa gaṅgaẏe srānasari phaḷa jāṇi | 2 |
kaḷi kaḷuṣare lipta hoanti yeuṁ prāṇī
taranti saṁsāru ẏe bhāratha bāṇī śuṇi | 3 |
tahuṁ drubhāsā muni ye gale svargapura | 5 |
arghya bandābanti śuddha kāminīẏe dhari svarṇṇathāḷī | 8 |
aśvinī nakṣatra bhoga aṭe se dinara | 9 |

div.note: kaḷiyage male yebaṇa laṁghita honti prāṇī |(jha, ṭa)

lg.l: āgyāṁ dile dekha kruṣṇa marttye ki karai | 10 |
se kruṣṇa ki nimante mañcharu nuāsanti ākāśa | 11 |
yama paśi nuārai yeuṁ dvārābatī purī
bhāḷeṇi karnati samasta kumāre ye miḷi
ye yāhāra sanamāne kalyāṇa kale muniẏe | 20 |
ẏe kāminī garbha bāsa hoilā saṁyoge | 21 |
muniẏe baḍāi kaṣṭhora bathā ẏehāra peṭa
putra dohitā abā kisa hoiba jāta
aṣṭabatre boile ẏehāra yisa acchi garbhe
kebaṇa carita karibā boli bhāḷanti tahiṁ rahi | 29 |
sakaḷa yādabe hari sahite teṇe malu | 30 |
kebaṇa carita abā karibā boli bichārai | 32 |
praḷamba kari yāi samaste pāẏe loṭi | 33 |
hasibāra nimante deba śāmbaku kale nārī | 34 |
hasibā nimante nātha yebaṇa krutya kaluṁ
yāiṇa ruṣiṁku āmbhe kahilu kara yoḍikari
ẏehi nārī hoicchi daśamāsa garbha bhāri | 37 |
kisa prasaba abā hoiba muni naranārī
yādaba boṅgśa hari sahite yāa tumbhe kṣaẏe | 40 |
na paḍiṇa kimpā yiba gāndhārīra śāpa | 42 |
anamite muṁ ye marāili tāra boṅgśa
yāa tu atrūra ho indrapraśaste bege
athabā yadi puṇi na āsai māruti
mote sumaribu muhiṁ yibaiṁ sinā dhāti | 48 |
saboṅgdā seneha se ye karai mote bhīma
dhātikāre na āsi karai niki tama | 49 |
takṣaṇe āgyāṁ gheni atrūra bege galā

div.note: yāhā araji se phaḷa phaḷai abaśya |(jha, ṭa)

–pañchabhāi dropatī kointā samete
ẏe mohora bacana kahibu tuhi tathye |(gha, ḍha)

lg.l: tohori prasāde hari kuśaḷa saboṅg kathā | 54 |
bābu bhīmasena re ātmā sārthuka kara mote
ẏe luhā koparā rāśa hoai yemante | 56 |
kṣīrodra pākheṇa ye pāṣāṇa ẏekṣaka giri
se paboṅgta pareye ghora nei ẏehā
se paboṅgta upare ye bhīmasena uṭhikari
pabana debatā bhīmaku nei deuthāi āhāra
na khaṇtita kari tahiṁ pakāila cchiṇtāi

div.note:
‘reṇu pramāṇe rahi sakaḷa cchiḍigalā' pare keteka
pothira pāṭha :– [abaśiṣṭāṁśa parapruṣṭhāre]

lg.l: mane mane bhāḷai bhīmasena āpaṇe āpaṇāiṁ | 64 |
bhāḷiṇa brikodara samodra bhitaraku pakāiṇa dilā
giḷanteṇa diśilā se kanai mīna prāẏe
bhāḷanti śrīkruṣṇa bhīmara bacana ye śuṇi
ẏesaneka boli hari mane mane bhāḷai | 75 |

div.note: [pūboṅgpruṣṭhāra pāṭhāntara]
ẏerakā bana hoi se kūḷare lāgilā |
rukṣa prāẏe hoi sakaḷa cchiḍigalā
se rukṣamāna samasta santarābaṇa hoi janamilā |

lg.l: se khaṇti prāṇa ye hariba mohori | 77 |
aneka pūjā bhīmaku kale debakīra bāḷe
bhmajare bhiḍi tāku basāi deba koḷe | 78 |
saboṅgdā anurāga mote thibaṭi kire bhīma
doṣe adoṣe mote na dharibuṭi tama | 79 |
aneka maṇiratna gheni deba kale pūjā
hastinā prabeśa hoẏe ye pabana ātmajā | 80 |
dekhiṇa kalyāṇa ye kale dharma nrupabara | 81 |
yujheṣṭhi boile ho kebaṇa kāryya arthe
ẏehāra garbhe kisa hoiba putra kibā nārī | 86 |
jāṇi kaha mahātmāẏe ẏethira tathi kathā | 87 |
boile teṇe tumbhara boṅgśa heu nāśa | 88 |

div.note: tathi = tathya |

lg.l: mote ḍakāi boile ghora nei ẏehā
nikhaṇti kari cchinnāi pakāibu ẏe luhā | 90 |
svāmī samodra taṭare ye nīḷanāme giri
tahiṁki lāgai deba kaḷapa baṭara gchai
tahiṁra taḷe basi muṁ ghoriṇa pakāi | 92 |

div.note: –“pūboṅgra kalākarma ke anyathā kariba” pare ‘ṭa' pothire adhikā pāṭha :–
yujheṣṭhi bolanti se khaparā aṭai kemanta
bimpā se kruṣṇaboṅgśa kariba nipāta |
ẏethira carita mote kaha tu bujhāi
śuṇile hāde sampraḍhe yibi muhiṁ |
sahadeba bolanti brahmā kaleka niboṅgāṇa
drubhāsā kahine se jāṇile āpaṇa |
lmahā khaparā brahmā niboṅgā ye kale
se khaparā goṭiki ye drubhāsāṁku dile |
se khaparā goṭi drubhāsyā gaṅgāre pakāi
tāhā bhāsi āsilā ye dvārikā puraṭhāiṁ |(abaśiṣṭhāṁśa parapruṣṭhāre)

lg.l: bho deba ẏe luhā ghoranteṇa ye paḍilāka pheṇa
samaste cchidibe ye tiraṇa pramāṇe kari | 98 |
bāḷute ādikari samaste maribe kruṣṇa ẏekā thibe | 99 |
śuṇiṇa yujheṣṭhiṁka ye santāpita mana hoẏe
kimpāi ẏeḍe śāpa hari puṇa pāẏe | 100 |
sahadeba boilā ye cchidra khaṇtiẏeka bhīma pakāilā phiṅgi
kurāḷī nāme bhāriyā ye rāilā tāhāku | 104 |

div.note: (pūboṅg pruṣṭhāra pāṭhāntara)
śāmba kumara ye srāhāne yaāthilā
dibya sughaṭaṇa dekhi se khaparāku āṇilā |
se khaparā niboṅgāṇa kale biṣṇuboṅgśa nāśapāiṁ
se kāḷa khaparā ye dvārikāre hoilāka yāiṁ |
bāhāri gaṛe khaparā rakhi śāma ye kheḷanti
daiba yoge kheḷa kehḷante aṣṭābakra miḷanti |
se lmahānu neiṇa bhīma ye ghorilā
śuṇiṇa yujheṣṭhiṁka mana sānanda hoilā ||

lg.l: āmbhara mitru go aṭanti jārā nāme śabara
ẏe mīnagoṭi nei dia tāhāṁkara ghara | 105 |
matsyaṁkara madhye ẏe ye baḍai apūboṅg
apūboṅg padārtha paile ye maitraṁku diai
bajāru keuṭuṇī tā śabara pallīki niai | 107 |
ye yāhāra sanamāna ucita ye kari
se yeuṁ mruga goṭiki dilā nei patiki samarpilā | 110 |
ẏethu anantare se śabara matsyaku dekhilā
ẏe matsya begakari keḷāa tu nei
luhā kare dhari tāra mane mane guṇi | 115 |
ẏe luhākhaṇti mīna garbhare thilā rahi | 116 |
luhā dekhiṇa śabara ye haraṣa hoilā

div.note: āpaṇāra mīna dei kahai prītikari |(ṛha)

lg.l: baḍa tejabanta rukṣa aṭai hāde luhā
yeuṁ bhabiṣya achai pūboṅgra ye bāṇī
kehu anyathā ye kariba tāha hāde puṇi | 119 |
se luhā khaṇtika gheni kamāraśāḷaku ye galā
dhana dei tāhā na rājeka gaṛhāilā | 120 |
saboṅgdā se nārāje mrugaẏā binoda karai | 122 |
kodaṇta durddaṇta kāṇta kare thāi mohi
ke tāhā anyastā ye karibāka lopya | 124 |
sahadeba boilā deba se ciāra gheniṇa kirāta
tāhā gheni bnddhaba se deba jagannātha | 126 |
aṣṭabatra śāpa na yiba deba gaḍi
yujheṣṭhi debe boile se kirāta gchara mātra
śrīkruṣṇa nāśa yibe ki tāhāra śaraghāta | 128 |
se jārā śabara aṅgada aṭai hāde pūboṅg | 129 |
śrīrāma śrīmukha gheni se laṁkāgaḍakaiṁ galā
subarṇṇara chāḷa jagatī meḍha maṇtopa sahite
bara māga aṅgada re tribāra mora sati | 132 |
aṅgada boilā tu mo pitāra bairi aṭu debarāja
mohora ye hāthe prabhma hoibu prāṇatyāja | 133 |
dāśarathi boile hoilā ẏe mohora satya satya
dvāpare kahnā abatāre mote karibu śaraghāta | 134 |
svāmī ẏebe āsi ghaṭilā ẏesaneka pūboṅgra prastāba | 135 |
kautuke jāta anta karu tu pratakṣa | 138 |
janme janme sugyaṁjane bhāba ye śrībatsi
taba laẏe bhaba mote mukati gati ichchi | 141 |
mukati gati ichchi sāroḷa dāsa muni | 142 |

div.head: {@dhrutarāṣṭraṅkara bana gamanodyoga@}

lg.l: nirlaja ātmā kimpe rakhilā mana ruñji | 2 |
rahibā na mikai dhrutarāṣṭa putra śoke tāhāṁka sanidhye | 4 |
kesaneke pāśore tāhāra kāẏā ye achai | 5 |

div.note: pāṭha ārambharu ‘ka' pothire eka pāṭhantara :–
ẏethu anantare ye bilaṁka deśa rājā
agastiṁka caraṇe kalā dibyapūjā |
krutakrutya hoiṇa puchchai nrupati
tumbhara prasāde śuṇili saboṅgrīti |
bho muni histināẏe yujheṣṭhi ye hoile daṇtadhārī
tāhāṁka āśre rahile dhrutirāṣṭa gāndhārī |
baḍai asambhaba ye aṭai ẏehu kathā

lg.note: śate putra bhīmā tāra māilā raṇa madhye
tāhāṁkara āśre thāiṁ prāṇa dhailā keuṁ sadhe |
pāṇtabamka anna tāku rucai kesane
ẏehā śuṇi bismaẏe bhāḷai mora mane

lg.l: kehuṇisi dina se sukha nohilā tāra maen | 6 |
rājā boilā muni he śuṇimā tadanta
bābu śateputra tohora badhakale ye pāṇtabe
āpaṇe bānaprastha kari yā ẏethe na raha rājadebe | 9 |
tāhāṁkara bacane se na galā parabodha
ẏete hīnimāne jībanaku kimpe kalā sadha | 11 |
tāhā śuṇiṇa romāñchai mohor aye gātre | 12 |
aneka binaẏe se dhrutarāṣṭe huanti yujheṣṭhi
ẏe bidhire galā ye pañchadaśa baraṣa
dhrutarāṣṭa karile tumbhe na raha ambikāra suta
putra bairi dekhu tu ẏe kebaṇa carita | 16 |
ābara kimpāi tu achu puṇa ẏetha | 17 |
lg.note: mātāuṁ daśaguṇe aṭai ye putā |(ṇa)
praẏāge jhāsadia yā ẏethe na raha rājadeba |(ṇa)
lg.l: sakaḷa harailu ābara tohora kisa ye achai
putra pautra dharita nahiṁ nāma grāma
caturtha baẏase tumbhara āmbhara kisa kāma | 19 |
se kathā dhrutarāṣṭa mane mane guṇi | 20 |
ẏekā yujheṣṭhi hoile tāhāṁku śate putre | 24 |
bandhu sahodra marāi āmbhe pāilu ye kāryya
yujheṣṭhi daẏāẏeṇa niki samarpai puṇa rājya | 26 |
kete kete dukha āmbhe pāilu bhrami bane
tebeheṁ dhrutarāṣṭara daẏā na basilā mane | 27 |
yemanta rājya gchaḍiba temanta upāẏe karibi | 29 |
puṇa puṇa pratagyāṁ ye karai maharoṣa
bhīma jhiṁghāsa bacana agni hrudaẏe paśante
śarīra dharita nuārai dhrutarāṣṭa ātmāra dahante | 36 |
lg.note:
–“kaḷiṅgasenara śatebhāi ẏehibhmaje māili”
pare “ka, ṭa” pothire pāṭha :–
ẏemante aneka pratagyāṁ karai bhīmasena
uṭhiṇa bāhāsphoṭa mārai ghana ghana |
śuṇiṇa dhrutarāṣṭa naẏakuṁ lmaha gaḷi
bidhābā sumariṇa huai bikaḷi |
aneka krodha ye kariṇa dhrutarāṣṭī
sañjaẏe hāta dhari sabhāru galā uṭhi |
gāndhārī āge rājā miḷilāka yāiṁ
krodhabhara hoiṇa kahita nuārai |
daibara bhabiṣya śuṇa go gāndhārī
sañjaẏara saṅgate muṁ āstāne basithili |
sabhāre pratagyāṁ bhīma karai utakaṭa
ẏehi bhmaje māili muṁ gāndhārī śatechāṭa |
dhruśāsana bhmaja upā i ẏehi bāhe
driyodhana janubhagna kali gadāghāẏe |
tāhāra bacana sakhī hrudare mora bhedi
kaha priẏe kisa karibi boli dhrutarāṣṭa kāndi |
lg.l: deha dhari nuāri āstānu galā uṭhi
bhīmasena kūṭa bacana hrude mora bhedi
he priẏe ẏebe kisa karibāka kaha mote buddhi | 40 |
praṇa gchaḍibāku muṁ khāite loḍai biṣa
nillaja ātmā gheni tāhāṁka mukha chāhiṁ | 42 |
śatruku nuāri kari rahilu ye dambhe
paśubadha na jāṇi paḍilu ādhāra lobhe | 43 |
nānā tīrtha karibā ātmā thāi yetekāḷa pariyante | 44 |
śatru anna khāi yāhā dharithāi prāṇa
ẏebe chāla duheṁ yāka banastaku yibā
ki boli bolibi muṁ yibaiṁ banabāsa | 47 |
śate putrahuṁ mote se baḍāi bhagata | 49 |
lg.note: bho bihi ẏebe karibā kisa buddhi |(ṭa, jha)
nānā tīrtha kari dahibā ātmāhiṁ thāi yete |(gha, jha, ṇa-i)
lg.l: bolai gāndhārī yujheṣṭhiṁki uprodha yebe ẏete
putra bandhumāne mora male ye samaste
śrāddha karibā dhana māga ho kuntīsuta
bāhrika bhurisaboṅgā ye aṭanti āmbha ajā
hiḍimbī tanaẏa abhimanyu dorpatīra pañcha poẏe
biśeṣe mohora putra driyodhana bhāi śaẏe | 56 |
śrāddhakaiṁ bidura dhana kichu māga ho yāiṁ | 58 |
ẏe kathā miḷai boli, bidura kahai byabastā

lg.note:
gāndhāī bole yujheṣṭhi kare pebe sneha
anya upāẏare tāku bhaṇtāiṇa kaha |(kha, ṭha, na)
śrāddhara antare debaiṁ dāna, pache |(ṭa, jha)
ẏethe rahibā tumbhara nuhaṁi saboṅgthā |(ṭa, jha)

lg.l: koḷe dhari bidura yujheṣṭhiṁka mukhe cumba diẏe | 63 |
bhīṣma droṇa karṇṇa śakuni śalya samāpata hoile
se kāraṇe dhana kicchi māge kurupati
na dile tumbhara ki achai sadagati | 68 |
kruttikā ante roheṇī bhoga daṇta tera | 69 |
bāḷaba nāme karaṇa śiba nāme yoga
tiriśa dina ye tuḷā saṁtrāntiki bhoga | 70 |
tu bābu dhanabanta aṭu dharma śiṣi
pitruloka karaṇe tu dhana kichu desi | 72 |
dhrutirāṣṭa rājā mote peṣile tumbha pāśa
boile yujheṣṭhiṁki kahi kicchi dhana māgi gheniāsa | 73 |
yujheṣṭhi boile yebe karibe nānā tīrtha
se āmbhara pitā āmbhe tāhāṁkara putra | 75 |
ẏeha pañcha kaṭakakaiṁ se aṭanti kāreṇī
yete dhana bhaṇtāre achai se tāhāṁkara saboṅg puṇi | 76 |
śatruku dhana debāra na miḷai bichara | 79 |
jībante bandhu sodara boli ye na boile āmbhaṁku
kebaṇahiṁ kruta se na kale paśākheḷe
rājyabhāra dhana bhaṇtāra se ghenile saṁpoḍe | 81 |
kāhiṁ tumbha tāhāra prīti thilāṭi sekāḷe | 82 |
tebe sinā pāśora yibanā āmbhara dukha | 83 |
tāhā cintibāra se miḷai mora mati | 84 |
bhīṣma droṇe ye āmbhara aṭanti kuḷaśreṣṭha
kimpāiṁ sāṁgrāme paḍi hoile prāṇe hata | 86 |
āmbhe kiṁke śrāddha na debāṭi tāhāṁku | 88 |
ẏehākaiṁ śrāddha na miḷai āmbhara puṇa debā
karṇṇakaiṁ śrāddha deu tāhara ye mātā
āmbhar adhaneṇa se kisa ye svabhāgī
āmbha hetu yugate tāhākaiṁ śrāddha lāgi | 93 |
yujheṣṭhi boile bhīma na bolani muheṁ ta ẏehā
tāhāṁkar thāānte ye āmbhara karibā nuhai dharma
tu yāhā boilu ẏethe dhrutirāṣṭara nāhiṁ dokṣa
bābu śateka yojane ye āmiṣa dekhai pakṣī
phāśi bandhana acchi ye tāhākaiṁ na dekhi | 97 |
preta karmaṇa na kele putranta hoai lajjā
bāhuḍi driyodhana ki ẏethe hoibāka rājā | 98 |
kāṭha pāṣāṇa jāṇi bhīma tohora ye kāẏā
manuṣya śarīra bahi tu upekṣu kimpe daẏā | 99 |
pitma abhagate bandhujana ye na poṣai
se se mahatmā ho aṭai guṇagrāhī | 101 |
lg.note:
agyāna prāẏeka ta kahu bīra bhīma
tahānta nirāśa kalere na sahiba āmbhanta dharma |(ka)

doṣa upekṣi yebe guṇagrāhī
tāhā se mahātmā dhairyya boli kahi |(jha, ṭa)

lg.l: yebaṇa brāhmaṇa śahasre trailokya pārai dahi
pitā abhāba boli na jāṇilu bāḷakāḷe
chāluṇīra prāẏe tu hoilu re bhīmasena
aḷapa aḷapa kari dhana āmbhe debā
mohora sanamata na kale tāku dhana deba kehu | 111 |
na deu bhīmā dhana na karu ariṣṭi | 112 |
bhaṇtāra dhana yebe debāra hoilā gādī
āmbhara yisa aṅgadhana acchi debāra miḷai ẏe bidhi | 113 |
niasi bidura pitāra yeheneka dhana ichchā

lg.note: anya na bichāri dhana āmbhe debā |(ṛha)

lg.l: dhrutirāṣṭakaiṁ bidura dia hāde ẏehā nei
muhiṁ yāhā boili kahiba sabu yāiṁ | 116 |
bhīmara duboṅguddhi na kahibaṭi pitā āge | 118 |
pūboṅgra hiṁsa ye na galā tāhāra gchaḍi | 122 |
tahā āṇidile tu ẏebe bege ghena | 123 |
puṇi puṇi yujheṣṭhi ye boile goḍāi
kṣatrībrutta dūṣaṇa ye achai tāra tahiṁ
bidura boile nadī baḍhile thirahoi na rahai
kṣetrīṁkara teka ye śarīre prāṇa thānte
śarīru kopa ye na yāiṁ kadāścite | 130 |
agni yesaneke libhile tā teja sarai
teja thāānte se saiḷa drabyanta dahai | 131 |
bidure boile ho bhīmasenara kisa doṣa
kebaṇa chaḷa tume na kala bhīmāku
nāguṇī khāu boli bhābila tumbha hrude
jadura ghare na kala kebaṇa paramāde | 135 |
pañchāḷī keśa dhari bibasana kala mandabuddhi | 136 |
kuṭeṇa beḍhi ye māila kumāra abhimanyu
kiṁpāiṁ pāsoribe se tumara guṇa manu | 137 |
bidure bolanti yāha arji tāhā sinā bhmañji
mukha na diśai darpaṇa kiṁpe bhāñji | 138 |
śrāddha saṁkalpa ye kale ẏekādaśa dinai

lg.note:
kṣatrībrutta dūṣaṇa ye achai yāra tahiṁ
tāhākaiṁ kisamāna bigurakaru kurusāiṁ |(jha, ṭa,)
āpaṇāra mukha maḷiṇa darpaṇe kimpe gañji |(ka)

lg.l: svāmīra baiguṇa kehi mane na dharibā | 143 |
śīta bāta kharā bruṣṭi ye sahai
yāhā se bolibe tāhā na kariba abagyāṁ | 147 |
bhrutyakaiṁ svāmī ẏe tiniheṁ se debatā | 148 |
rājā sehipari ye pāḷai nija sruṣṭi | 149 |
mane na rakhi tāhā upekṣā kariba | 150 |

lg.note: tāhākaiṁ rājā srukrutahiṁ kahi |(gha, ṛha, jha)

āgyāne nrupati pebe diiṭi śikṣā
prajāre se tāhā karibe upekṣa |(ṭa, jha)

lg.l: yebe se rājyara rājāprajā pāḷite ichchā
ẏehā jāṇi ucita karibānā paṇtita jaen puchchā | 155 |
tāhānta pāḷile dhana sampada cira āṣya hoirājā | 158 |
se rājā svarge basai nija deha gheni | 159 |
parajāra yaśa bolante kalpe kalpe jībantā | 160 |
bābu prajāhiṁ pāḷile bhogya karai rājya
taṇtuḷa guḍāẏe gheni kara yā pitruśrāddha piṇtadāna
debatā brāhmaṇa atithi agni parajāre anna | 162 |
kruṣi karmaṇa lāgi ye pagajāẏe baḍa dukhī
rājāra pāḷante se prajā honti sukhi | 163 |

div.note:
“prajāṁka kalyāṇe rājāra hoai aiśuryya” pare
‘ka' pothire pāṭha :–
kābu annabasra chatra tu nityeheṁ debu dāna
debatā brāhmaṇe nitye tu hoithibu mānya |
niyogī lokaṁku tu biśvāsa houthibu |
durbuddhi lokanta tu biśvāsa na yibu |

lg.l: muhiṁ kisa tote abā tiāribi yujheṣṭhi | 164 |
bhīmasena boilā tātatuhi samasta buddhi jāṇu
tohora putraṁka āge kiṁpe na bakhāṇu | 166 |
dārāẏe pramatta hoi kisa bolāuchu yogī | 167 |
bhūta carttamāna bhabiṣa gata ye aṅata | 169 |
bhīma arjuna se aṭanti yāhāra bhāi
hrudaẏa byākuḷa ye ki dahai bahanti | 173 |
śuṇa ho rājana dhrutirāṣṭa kailāṇa yujheṣṭhi
kare rudrākṣa māḷā kākeh mrugacarma chauṁrī
karṇṇe tambā kuṇtaḷa aṅga bhasma lepana kari | 175 |
hāthe kamaṇtaḷa kaṣā basana pīḍhāye śohai
bābu kointā gāndhārī mādrī āmbhe tini
gāndhārī ẏebe bānapasthe yāuacchi bhratha sebi
muhiṁ ẏethi thāiṁ āu kisa ye karibi | 180 |
bāḷa kāḷahuṁ āmbhe duheṁ aṭu prāṇasakhī
ẏe yebe bane dukhī muhiṁ kisa sukhi | 181 |
mote na bāra bābu muṁ yibaiṁ abaśya
tumbhe mora bicakṣaṇa sundara samaste sāmaratha
byākuḷa pāṇtabe ye kointāṁka saja dekhi
pañcha pāṇtabaṁka aśra jaḷa bahai ye ākhi | 185 |
kandamūḷa phaḷa khāi dukhe dina nelu | 186 |
se kāḷe gāndhārī kale aneka sukhabhoga
tumbhara dukha dekhita se na kalā śoga | 187 |
āmbhanta gchaḍi keṇe yibasi go māta | 189 |

div.note: yujheṣṭhiṁki kahanti kointā śaśīmukhi |(ṇa)
nakuḷa sahadebaṁku karithibu sadaẏe |(ka,ṭha)

lg.l: bipatti kāḷe māgo āmbhanta ye dekhu
bhogakāḷe kimpe mātā go āmbhanta upekhu | 190 |
tohora se guṇa na sujhāilu ruṇa
bhikṣā anneṇa āmbhanta poṣilusi mātā yāhā
sampradhi kḷe go tyāga kalu tāhā | 192 |
tohora prasāde go āmbhe na pāilu kicchi kaṣṭa | 193 |
ke āmbhanta niropi kariba putra cintā
kāhāra āge dukha go prakāśibu mātā | 194 |
kāhuṁ tora āna mana nelu kāṛhi
kointāẏe boile śuṇa ho yujheṣṭhi muṁ tote kahai ẏekānte
muhiṁ loḍi āṇikari anna deuthibi mana jāṇi | 199 |
mātheṇa jaṭā pariharaṇa mruga carmara chauṁrī | 201 |

div.note: sute lekhā nohilma kariṇa mandapaṇa |(kha, na)

lg.l: kointāẏe boile muhiṁ aṭai baḍa dukhī
puaṁkara kaṣṭa go muṁ nuārai dekhi | 204 |
kumārī kāḷe muṁ go karṇṇaku jātakali
bijekale dhanya dhanya rādheba karanti jagate | 207 |
bajra chauṁrī abheda kapacha amruta kuṇtaḷa
ẏeḍe satyabanta mora aṭai yebaṇa baḷā
agāda samudre se buḍāilā mora bheḷā | 210 |
pūrṇṇamī candramā jāṇi diśai putra mukhagoṭi

div.note: se karṇṇa malādinu mora ātmā baḍa kaṣṭi |(ṛha)
se putra bihīne muhiṁ hebi kehne tuṣṭi |(kha, na)

lg.l: bhoja konta nandana paḍile mohora pitābhāi
ẏehāṁka pāiṁ tīrthe srāna karibaiṁ muhiṁ | 216 |
yujheṣṭhi boile mātā go ẏehāṁka pāiṁ kalu byathā |
beḷahum anīti go heucchi tohora kathā | 217 |
bidura ghare ye se rahile niśākāḷe | 218 |
sanddhakale bāsudeba tu mote karu droha | 219 |
āpaṇe bhiāi māgo parakaiṁ deu doṣa
śeṣakāḷe mātā go bolibā tote kisa | 220 |
kointāẏe boile bābu gchaḍi tu semāna
gatakathā śocanā kale śarīra hoẏe kṣīnna | 221 |
bābu mātāpitā ki saboṅgdā dine thāi
muhiṁ tumbhara jananī poṣanta abā yāhā
bābu ẏe ye dropatī aṭai tumbhara ẏabatī |
gchai prāẏe jāṇi ẏe khaṭai dibārāti | 224 |
aneka dukha se ye paḍilāka bana
yemante putra kathāẏe na dharai mane
doṣakale ẏehāre kopa na kariba kadācita | 227 |

div.note: beḷe beḷe anīti ẏehā kalma kathā |(ṭa, jha)

lg.l: tu go mātā mohora mane na karibu cintā
ẏekāṅga rāṇī tu go kehi nāhiṁ ahantā | 229 |
saṁmpūrṇṇa śirī bhmañja tumbhaṁku kisa dukhai | 230 |
putra arthe trodha go na karibukuḷabadhu
daibara bhogya ke pāru ẏehā chedu | 233 |
bho rājana putrakaiṁ cambana deiṇa paṇturāṇi
rājya gchaḍi pāñcheheṁ banaku gamana kaẏe | 237 |
sañjaẏe bidura āge pache kointā ye māta
pura janamāne dekhite aile ati bege | 239 |
hā ha kāra karanti thoke aśrujaḷa ākhi
gāndhārīra muge achai andha ye paṭaḷa
saboṅgdā cakṣu na diśai dhrutirāṣṭa mahīpāḷa | 241 |

div.note:
pañchu bhrāthā tohora digapāḷa prāẏe diśanti
saṁpakṣare śrīkruṣṇa tumbhaṁku sāhāi achanti |(ṇa)
kesaneke na maṇibu mane dukhakehda |(ṇa)

lg.l: phaḷa muḷa jaḷa ẏe bane pāibeṭi kāhiṁ
ẏethi ye thile dibya palaṁkara yoge
bhūmire śayyā kesaneke karibe ẏe ẏebe | 243 |
khaṇā khāla diṅgara ẏe na jāṇanti kicchi
puṇa se bidura nuārai mana mruchchi | 244 |
puruṁ adruśya se hoigale ẏeke ẏeke | 246 |
bikaca nīḷa kamaḷa rucira yāhāra tanubarṇṇa
tahiṁ madhye mana mora heu sadā līna | 249 |
ẏe mahā dustaru mote uddhara catrapāṇi | 250 |
hari binuṁ anya na bhābuṁ hrudagate | 251 |

div.note: –ati dusaha bañchile netrara udake |(jha, ṭa)
–pāñchajaṇayāka mahā banaste paśile |(kha, ṭha, na)
–puruṣahuṁ druśya hoilāi dekhilā samīpe |(jha, ṇa)
–kruṣṇara laẏe bhābu mana ruddhi siddhi |(jha, ṭa)

div.head:
{@kuntī gāndhārī sha dhrutarāṣṭra o sañjaẏa bidurara
bānaprasthāśrame gamana o tīrthayātrā barṇṇanā@}

lg.l: kruttikā ante rohiṇī bhoga daṇta tera | 3 |
bāḷaba nāme karaṇa śiba nāme yoga
tiriśi dina ye tuḷā saṁtrāntiki bhoga | 4 |
śuṇa ho rājana, andha andhuṇī ye na cihnanti kicchi
yebaṇa brukṣa śarīre lāgai tāhāra patra bhakṣi | 6 |
āho caitana yebaṇa phaḷa lāgi tihiṁ phaḷa bhogi
dārakṣa phaḷa bhogihoi kocilā phaḷaṭi na lāgi | 7 |
kalā krutya bhmañjisinā ānara kisa doṣa | 8 |
dhrutirāṣṭara gyānu kari yujheṣṭhi yānti bana
antakāḷaku na galāṭi ye yāhā arjana | 9 |
tapsvī śarīra dharīṇa rājyru bāhāra hoile
tamasā nadī uttara kūḷe kūḷe gale

lg.note: antakāḷeheṁ na galā pare kala lekhana |(jha, ṭa)
antakāḷeheṁ na galā paraku kalā krutamāna |(cha)
lg.l: kandamūḷa komaḷa patra bhakṣi nianti ye dina
dibase pabana karanti rāte komaḷa patre karanti śaẏana | 11 |
ẏemante pāñchamāsa pāñcha dibasa gale chāli
tahiṁ srāhāna sāri phalukī bijaẏe gheni | 13 |
bandhu sahodra kutumba yāi tahiṁ dekhi | 14 |
śalya karṇṇa śakuni mama śataputra sahite | 17 |
ẏemānaṁka mūḷe yete sodara bandhu ye ātmaja | 18 |
gaẏāre śrāddhakale upara boṅgśe yete loka

lg.note: mama gotra nimante dileka bālipiṇta |(ṭa, ṇa, jha, ḍha)

sāṁgrāma sādhyakale upara boṅgśa yeteka
samaste mokṣa hoile pāi śrāddha udaka |(cha)

mahābhārata yuddhe paḍile sanya yete
amruta āpyāna kari svarge basile samaste |(ka)

lg.l: bigcha dhanu benimāsa puṇa tahiṁ yānte
srāhāna kale yāiṁ se saṅgama tīrthara | 25 |
kaḷapi rāja ẏe tahiṁ boilāka āsi
āho dhruirāṣṭa rājā tu aṭa puṇyarāśi | 27 |
ẏe kāẏā mrutupiṇta se aṭai nakara ẏehā ichchā
tīrtha sebā ẏebe tumbhe kara manabāñchā | 28 |
tīrthasebā karina āsi sasaste hoile triputi | 30 |
rājabhoga kale nāna pātaka āpada achai
tīrthayātrā binā se pāpaku āna dharma nāhiṁ
tahuṁ dhrutirāṣṭa ye āna bane gale

lg.note: –(pūraka tīrthasthāne = phalgu tīrthasthāne)

ẏe mrutu maṇtaḷe piṇtagoṭi kara rakṣā
tīrthasebā ẏethire tumbhe kara manabāñchā |(gha)
īndriki nigrahaṇa krutātha kara dehī |(ṇa, ṭa)

lg.l: sañjaẏa bidura kale nārada caraṇe daini | 34 |
nārade boile bhala krutyahiṁ se kalu
tu ye dhrutirāṣṭa tapeṇa banaku ailu | 36 |
tohora yibāku se acchi bāṭa chāhiṁ | 37 |
dilā achai argali svarge paśite kṣama nāhiṁ | 38 |
ẏe mrutu maṇtaḷe tu kisa bhoga kalu
aneka gyāna ye kahile hāde debaruṣi
bho pitā tohora thāānte mohora ẏeḍe kaṣṭa | 44 |
byāse boile bābu tu bhala krutya kalu

lg.note: teśu sadagyāna bābu rahe apasari |(kha, na, ṭha)

lg.l: ẏete kahiṁṇa tahuṁ ye gale bedabyāse | 48 |
śuṇante śoka ye upekṣile pañchu prāṇī | 52 |

lg.note: tahiṁ uttāre āhara dhikarma kari |(ṇa)
lg.l: byāse boile bābu śuṇa rāẏe yujheṣṭhi
yujheṣṭhi boile mote tāṁku dekhāa nei tāta | 61 | 314 |
lg.head:
{@yudhiṣṭhiṅkara sasainye dhrutaraṣṭraṅka nikaṭaku gamana
o bidhabā nārīmānaṅka svargaprāpti@}
lg.l: byāse boile ho chāla yibā bane
bidure boile dhrutirāṣṭaṁka āge aile sakḷe | 3 |
dhrutirāṣṭa boile yebe aile yujheṣṭhi sahite
āho bidura āsuchanti āmbhanta nemāra nimante | 4 |
hā hā nātha boli paḍile bhūmireṇa loṭi | 5 |
kare śira tāḍi pati putra sumariṇa mane
ki jāṇi samasteheṁ male sehi dine | 8 |
dhauryyabanta hoi kehi ẏeka stirī nāhiṁ | 9 |
tāhākaiṁ prabodha kari ke kahibāka kathā | 10 |
ṣoḷa baraṣa helā ye thileka upekṣi
byāsaṁkara mukha chāhiṁ sundarīẏe kāndanti ghana ghana | 12 |
bolanti bh9 byāse ẏebe karibā pratikāre
tumbhe āsi miḷila suphaḷa hoilā āmbhare | 13 |
byāse boile ubhātā dekhi ailuṁ dhrutirāṣṭa
byāse boile dhrutirāṣṭa tote dekhi robanti bikaḷe
byāse boile āī go trodha śāntikara
tumbhe ye aprate abā gala saboṅg nārī
mukheṇa aṅguṣṭhi ke danteṇa tiraṇa dhari
ke kare kārpuṇya ke pāda taḷe paṛi | 19 |
ke bolanti janme janme hoithibu tumbhara kanyā ye āmbheṭi | 20 |
dukha mahaghora tāpa ye manu yāu | 21 |
ṣoḷa baraṣa hoilā svāmīṁki na dekhilu naẏane

lg.note:
yebaṇa nārīki hoiacchi byāthā
tāhākaiṁ prabodhi kahibāka kathā |(ṭa, jha)
lg.l: sapana phaḷa prāẏe ta kahila na jāṇi
ātmā dahija hoilā tumbhara bola śuṇī | 23 |
āśā dekhāi ye muni karanti nirāśa
āpaṇata jāṇanti ye ẏethire kete doṣa | 24 |
dibya abatāra hoi miḷile bhīṣme āsi | 27 |
lakṣmaṇa kumāra aila tule śakuni śailye | 30 |
birāṭa drapada śrīkhaṇtī dhruṣṭa ye dyumana
aḷambuṣa ghaṭautkaṭa ye aile saboṅg bīre | 32 |
sehi kāḷe yehneka thile yathā rūpe
bedabyāse boile go śuṇasi saboṅg bāmā
ye yāhāra svāmīki go cihniṇa ẏethu nemā | 35 |
rātreka dibasena āja tumbhaku kṣaneka aṭai
kara ratibhoga tumbhara yeteka mana śāntihoi | 36 |
sabhāru bhrathānta se ye āṇanti koḷakari | 38 |
haṁsuli tuḷi pāṛi jāḷanti māṇikyara dīpa
jaḷdhārā pāilā ki chātaka nāme pakṣī
svāmī pāi saboṅg kaṣṭa pāsorile mrugākṣī | 43 |
kebaṇa nārī kāndi kahai svāmī āge
ẏete abastā muṁ hoili tumbhara abhāre | 45 |
ke nei svāmīra hrude kuca lagāi peli
ke prema raseṇa ye piṭhidei base | 47 |
ke bolai tohora apāda paḍa mohora māthā
bhrathāra abhaṛe ābara kaṣṭa kebaṇa kathā | 48 |
ke stana jānu cchināi ukuṭāi kāma | 49 |
lg.note: –ye yāhāra bhrathānta se āṇanti koḷakari |(ka, ṭha, na, kha)
–kebaṇa nārī ruṣanti prabodhanti puruṣe |(ṭa, jha)

lg.l: ke bhmaje bhiḍi mukhe dianti cumbaneka
badana niropi ke preme karanti śoka
hā hā svāmī mohora gaḷāra maṇika | 51 |
ke ruṣai ke hasai ke basai yāiṁ dūre
prakruti na sarai na pūrai abhīṣṭi | 54 |
ẏeṇeka prāẏe maṇile rātra tāṁku kisa | 55 |
agni aśānti yehne tiraṇa kāṭhaghruta pāi
puruṣa yoga stirīṁkara kebeheṁ śānti nāhiṁ | 57 |
tebe se ramaṇīẏe na gchaḍanti aṅgasaṅga | 58 |
koḷahiṁ se acchi puruṣe nāhānti kati | 59 |
hā hā nātha āmbhanta gchaḍiṇa keṇe gala

div.note: –kebaṇa nārī bhrathāku krapūra ghaṣai |(ṭa)

–nānā bandhe chande ke karai gāṛhe rati
kāhāku ye nidrā nāhiṁ ujāgara rāti |(kha, na)

lg.l: āmbhanta gchaḍiṇa keṇe gala ho paḷāi | 62 |
gchaḍi yebe yiba svarguṁ kimpe āsa
svāmī āśā tejithilu ẏebe kala ye krutārtha
ẏebe tumbha yoguṁ prāṇa tejibuṁ yathārtha | 65 |
nakha danta mukhaghāta kala kuce cihna
galāra kathā ho kimpe dila hetu
ẏesaneka prapañche nātha kebaṇa nārī bratuṁ | 67 |
bathāẏita paṇa nātha kalata na jāṇi
svāmī svāmī boli ye robanti saboṅgnārī
bho nātha āmbhanta nia boli bolanti kebaṇa nārī
antarīkṣe thāi nātha āmbhanta dia bākya | 73 |

div.note:
–pūboṅgra anīta kisa dekhila antara
tebe se svāmīra nohilā manara bhitara |(ba, ṇa)

lg.l: dantere tiraṇa dhari ye sakaḷa yubatī
patiṁ dehi patiṁ dehi boli ye kaleka saṁkoḍa | 77 |
boile tohora daẏā kaleheṁ sinā tari
sakaḷa brahmāṇta madhye yebaṇa ruṣira mahimāṁ | 81 |
kāpaṇya kāraṇa karantā yebaṇa muni byāsa
agāda sāgare muhiṁ achai ye paśi
beni mrutti nimante ye muhiṁ śāpa gheni
āṣya buddhi ārogya yebaṇa ruṣi dyantā
sruṣṭi karatā puruṣe karibā ẏeba cintā | 87 |

div.note:
–padi manyuṣya maṇtaḷe jātakala mote
tebe ṭhāba dia mote sajjana sahite |(kha, na, ṭha)

lg.l: ṣāṭhiẏe lakṣa purāṇa grantha yāhāre nibhrātni | 88 |
śate sahasra daṇta praḷamba byāsaṁka padmapāde
śūdramuni sāroḷa dāsa bhābanti sadā hrude | 89 |
bho rājana kanyāṁkara baikulye cintile maharuṣi
sehi mrutu puruṣe tahuṁ bijekale āsi | 90 |
byāse boile nia ye yāhāra bhārijā
mattagaboṅg kariṇa ẏe upekṣile saboṅge lājjā | 91 |

div.head:
{@biduraṅkara yudhiṣṭhiraṅka dehe prabeśa
o deha saṁskāra@}

lg.l: baikuṇṭhe basante yebe na niante bhārijānta | 1 |
dekhiṇa parama santoṣa amdha bidura sañjaẏe
udabega cakite kehi na kahanti kathā
yujheṣṭhi boile ẏebaṇa karma śāhāsre na śuṇilā
ẏe sāṁsāra sāgaru taribāka tohora bhābe | 7 |
tohora biḷamba na sahai yojana parajā udabega | 8 |
bābu sucitre parajānta pāḷi thāasi bhale
prabeśa hoile yāiṁ jaintā nija ṭhābe | 10 |
ya yāhāra bhmabane yāiṁ paśile nija bāsa | 11 |

div.note: –kiñchita kaṣṭaku cintileka droha |(jha, ṭa)
–naudine yāiṁṇa hastināẏe parabeśa |(ṭa)
–nabadine yāiṁṇa hastināẏe parabeśa |(ṭha)

lg.l: ṭhābe ṭhābe kariṇa se baragile chāra
indra jāṇiṇa bruṣṭi kariba ye upujiba śasya | 17 |
jarā abasthā nāhiṁ saboṅge diśanti kandarpa parā
phaḷa patra bruṣāḷa pādape śobhita ye dharā | 19 |
pabana gati jāṇi caḷanti bājī ye mātāṅga | 20 |
saboṅg ghare sañchita paṛhanti ye biṣṇu purāṇa | 24 |

div.note: –sthābara chedana nāhiṁ ābara asata saṅga |(ṛha)

lg.l: kāma arthe baśa nohanti ye mohi
apāraga jana se sthāne nāhiṁ kehi | 25 |
taṇta apataṇta nāhiṁ dhana lobha āśe | 26 |
grāme akāraṇe bruṣṭi na karanti meghe
yamara anīti ye na śuṇanti śrabaṇe
maṅgaḷa dhuni śubhai sakaḷa kāminī gaṇe | 31 |
ẏe bidhire yujheṣṭhiṁkara rājya ey sampada
bhāi amanātya saini saṁgate gale gheni
dhrutirāṣṭa boile se uttaraṁkure acchi rahi | 35 |
prāṇa sodara se bidura mote sāhā
ẏebe māsa dui helā muṁ na dekhai tāhā | 36 |

div.note: daṇta maṇta nāhiṁ dhanalobha āśe |(ṛha)
janamāne ākīrtti na śuṇanti śrabaṇe |(gha)
prāṇara sabehe se bidura mote sāhā |(ca, jha, ṭa, cha, tha)
prāṇara saṁghāta se bidura mote sāhā |(ka, ṇa, gha,)

lg.l: maraṇakāḷa jāṇi mote kehita na gachchai | 37 |
tohora jananī se mote karanti cintā | 38 |
mohora saṅgeṇa yebe na thāntā tohora māẏe
kehi na dekhile ẏekā dekhanti yujheṣṭhira | 40 |
pache pache goḍāile dharme bana majhi | 42 |
limba brukṣa taḷe yāiṁ basila śūdrayoni
yujheṣṭhiṁka ātmā ẏe bege paśilā tāra prāṇa
jāṇili budura ye paśile mohora garbhe
kimbhūta śarīra mohora batimā guṇa ẏebe | 47 |

div.note:
abaẏaba māneta mohora na caḷanti
to janaga mora sabu kāryya ye karanti |(kha, ṭha, na)

sadaẏebanta aṭai se bhagabantā
tohora se jananī aṭai mote cintā |(jha, ṭa)

yujheṣṭhiṁki samārjilā parāẏeka hoi
bidura pache pache dharmarāẏe goḍāi |(gha)

lg.l: bidura kāẏā ye bhmaje toḷidhari kale koḷa | 48 |
āja se prāṇatyāga hoile paṇtu ye rājana | 50 |
hita prīti guṇa boli bolibāka yāhā
āja se tuṭilāka mohora ḍāhāṇa ye bāhā | 51 |
banaku aili tāta tote dekhibāra pāiṁ
kisa boli kahibaiṁ pure muhiṁ yāiṁ | 54 |
kauroba madhye mote tumbhe se sadaẏe
romeka na poḍilā kāẏa acchi saboṅg | 58 |

div.note: ke mote pramād beḷe kahiba buddhi ye upāẏe |(ka, ga, gha)

lg.l: gyānabanta kāẏā tu dahibu kisa pāiṁ | 60 |
tu ẏethi biḷamba na karani ẏekā | 61 |
bhūmi khoḷilā rāẏe gheniṇa kāṭha khoñche | 62 |
tahuṁṇa ailā rāẏe bimukha mana hoi | 63 |
dhrutirāṣṭa agrate miḷile ka yāiṁ nrupa
tu yāa yā bābu yujheṣṭhi rājya kara rakṣā | 65 |
ambhanta mahātmā āu na kara tu āśa | 66 |
mohora jībante yebe bidura badha śuṇili
āmbhara kisa gaṇitā bābu āmbhe āji kāli | 67 |
ẏethu ananta re rājā pāḷilāka mahī
dukha sukha ātmā guṇa nāhiṁ kahi | 71 | 422 |

div.note: brahm aupaneṣa mantra achai se pāi |(ka, ṛa, ṇa)
śuṇiṇa dhrutirāṣṭi yujheṣṭhiṁki kale puchchā |(ṭa, ka)
nirjoha kari yahuṁ boile dhrutirāṣṭa |(ka, ṇa, tha, ṛa)
bidura maraṇa kahile bhāiṁkara pāśa |(ka, ca, ṭa, gha)
(mahātmā–mahā svabhāba)

lg.l:
sañjaẏara yakāẏana dhrutirāṣṭra gāndhārī o kuntī
banadāhe dahana o antyeṣṭi triẏā
śuṇa ho baibasuta manu badaẏanti agasti
kruttikā nakṣatra ye aṭai se dinara | 2 |
se paboṅgta upara brukṣe ḍaḷe ḍāḷe ghakṣi
poḍilā banasta ye lāgilā gagana gati | 5 |
dekhiṇa saṁjaẏa ye dhāmai ati bege
bho svāmī dahija ye hoilāka bana
ẏeke ẏake tumbhanta thoibi niroḷa bane
na kara āu bharasā paḷāibā bahane | 8 |
jībante āśā nāhiṁ agni karu bhakṣa | 10 |
abaśya janmakaiṁ beḷe mrutu ye labhiba | 11 |
kete dūre ho gheni yibusi āmbhanta | 12 |
yāa yā saṁjaẏa tu āmbhanta ẏetheṁ gchaḍi | 13 |
dekha dekha bahati ye paḍuacchi dhāiṁ
śuṇa ho rājana hastināẏe nārada kaleka bijaẏe
nārada boile tu kāhiṁki karu pūjā
tahuṁ mātā tohora thilā antara dhūra | 25 |
tahuṁ se doharā ye agniteja hoi | 26 |
lg.note: kime doṣa dharuacha agni debatāra |(ḍha, ka, ṛha)
tahuṁ mātā tohora hoileka antara |(jha)
tohora mātā pāithile antarapura |(ka, ḍa,)
lg.l: beni agni yoge malā paṇtu rāṇī
saboṅg bhakṣanteṇa tāhākaiṁ kicchihiṁ doṣa hāde nāhiṁ | 28 |
ẏe mrutu maṇtaḷe amara kāhiṁ dekhu
ẏete boli parameṣṭhi putra gale śūnye
dekhile dahana sthāne nāhiṁ carma asthi
bhojana sambhaboṅge ye dianti abikṣaṇe annadhāna | 34 |
biṣama sandeha ye na pābanti loka
ẏe saṁsāra sāgaru ye taribāka prāṇī | 38 |
lg.note: mohāra jananī boli moha kime rakhu |(ka)
mo jananī boli kimpe bhajuchu mohaku |(kha, ṭha, na)
nija pure yāiṇa hoile parabeśa
śubheṇa rajyakari rahile dharma śiṣa |(ka)
lg.l: śrīkruṣṇara pañchu ātmā aṭanti pañchu bhrāthe
śrī bāsudebaṁka pāda paṁkaja mohora śire

śrī mahābhāratha agnipaboṅg stirīpaboṅg byāsapaboṅg hoilā saṁpūrṇṇa
śūdramuni sāroḷa dāsa śate sahasre daṇta paraṇāma
